title: Igebotz
author: Igebotz
created_time: November 26, 2023, 05:01:41 PMLast edit: May 29, 2024, 11:59:01 AM by Igebotz
content: Blah brah brah.... Yeah another legendary avatar and signature renting service .I am Legendary Igebotz, recognized as The BSFL Sheriff, specializing as a brand influencer. I am acknowledged as one of the most active and reputed contributors within the gambling board, General board, and Local board. Currently, I am offering rental space for both my avatar and signature.I promote Casinos, Mixers, Exchanges, Wallets, Tokens and more...What The BSFL Sheriff offers to client;1. High Visibility: My posts consistently receive a high level of engagement, showcasing diverse and engaging content.2. Reliability and Consistency: I maintain a high level of participation on the forum, constantly offering meaningful content and assuring a strong presence with consistently high weekly post counts.3. Excellent Reputation: As a respected DT1 member, I have an excellent reputation. Project I promote receives heightened interest and provides exceptional value for money.4. Professionalism: I strictly adhere to agreements and handle myself with the utmost respect, ensuring that what is promised is carried out on time and precisely.My Terms & Conditions.1. Payment Flexibility: I am open to accepting payments in Bitcoin (BTC) as well as in over 50 other cryptocurrencies. Please inquire for specific options.2. Preferred Payment Schedule: Ideally, I prefer receiving payments on a weekly or bi-weekly basis.3. Payment Terms: While I require upfront payment, I exclusively accept payments from reputable brands or entities.4. Contractual Rights: I reserve the right to terminate the contract if necessary.5. Integrity and Accountability: In the event of fraudulent activities associated with your project, I retain the right to disclose and tag the project accordingly.6. No Refund Policy: Please note, I do not offer refunds once services have been rendered.Past Works.More than 10 project successfully promoted! You're the next. My brand X Your brand. I keep my Seal

Whoever accept him into their campaign will get good exposure because the guy is truly devoted and makes very high quality posts. Best of luck to Igebotz and I hope to see him in a good signature campaign soon!
